definition: lit. torn body and crushed bones (idiom)/fig. to die horribly/to sacrifice one's life
powder/cosmetic face powder/food prepared from starch/noodles or pasta made from any kind of flour/whitewash/white/pink
body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158
to break down/to break into pieces/fragmentary
bone

sentences.english: Dantes ran down the rocks at the risk of being himself dashed to pieces.
sentences.chinese: 邓蒂斯冒着粉身碎骨的危险奔下岩石。

sentences.english: The past will always come, face must be destroyed.
sentences.chinese: 该来的始终会来，不面对就要粉身碎骨。

sentences.english: The atomizer comes along,blows me up.
Smashed to pieces muddy afraid to stay clean in the world.
sentences.chinese: 粉身碎骨浑不怕，要留清白在人间。

sentences.english: If our enemy dare to attack us, we'll punish them severely and crush them into pieces.
sentences.chinese: 敌人胆敢来犯，我们一定严惩不贷，打它个粉身碎骨。

sentences.english: A grenade blew them both to bits .
sentences.chinese: 一颗手榴弹把他们炸得粉身碎骨。

sentences.english: You smiled apathetically, for covering up oneself the powder body ground bone of the heart.
sentences.chinese: 你冷漠地笑了，为了掩饰自己内心的粉身碎骨。

sentences.english: Many were literally ripped to shreds, human flesh scattered over the square.
sentences.chinese: 许多人被炸得粉身碎骨，人肉撒满了广场。

definition: lit. the soul flies away and scatters (idiom)/fig. to be frightened stiff/spooked out of one's mind/terror-stricken
to offer one's life in sacrifice
fine powder/broken pieces
to die without a burial site/to die a pauper/a tragic end
pinyin: si3 wu2 zang4 shen1 zhi1 di4

definition: consigned to eternal damnation/with no hope of reprieve
lit. scattered ashes and dispersed smoke (idiom)/fig. to be annihilated/to vanish in a puff of smoke
to be decapitated (idiom)
to burn both jade and common stone/to destroy indiscriminately (idiom)
lit. mountains of daggers and seas of flames/fig. extreme danger (idiom)
to lose one's life/to get killed
to bury a corpse/to be buried/(fig.) to die (at sea, in a fire etc)
not to refuse to (idiom)/not to hesitate to
variant of 殞命|殒命[yun3 ming4]/to die/to perish
to lose one's life
ten thousand deaths will not prevent me (idiom); ready to risk life and limb to help out
to die/to perish
